attributes.action: ensure ITV does not drop family drama (such as Primeval) from Saturday nights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the BBC producing more quality family drama, ITV should also be able to do the same. Family shows like Primeval need to be aired to ensure that the BBC has competition and continues to invest in high quality drama. Saturday night family television is currently enjoying a high, and this should not be lost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
